fields.name: CHESTERFIELD Sofa group 3-seater+2-seater+Armchair
fields.description: Chesterfield is a sofa group with a trendy appearance in a classic British style. Style the living room by investing in a timeless sofa group that offers both 2-seater, 3-seater and a mammoth armchair in one and the same package. The furniture has a pleasant, upholstered seat that guarantees maximum comfort and the button-studded design is a stylish hit that is rounded off by the beautifully shaped legs that support the furniture. This soffa group is available online and in our showroom
